author: fabiocos
body:
#### PR description:

Remove obsolete code (the "CMS performance suite" of the beginning of Run1) no more used to avoid waste of time in maintaining and testing unused stuff. Move the digi dumper to a more appropriate location, nowadays SimGeneral/Debugging by @rovere looks appropriate (and the added code does not interfere with the existing one).

#### PR validation:

All the kept code is functional:

- cmsScimark2 runs and produces plots (probably of little interest but it does not harm)

- the digi dumper is running and producing output (in case of visual inspection of digis)

- a number of fragments used to set Timing and SimpleMemory services are in use and of course kept
title: Clean Validation/Performance
